name: Pixellut
description:
A 2D top-down wave shooter made with the Godot Engine in 1 week. My first game in the Godot engine, please enjoy playing it!

Controls:

  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • WASD to move

Credits:

  • Game music: https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/321009/
  • Menu music: https://freesound.org/people/moatdd/sounds/268603/
  • The PlugWorld YouTube channel for the tutorials
